actions.name: AddAttachmentsToSet
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more attachments to an AWS Support case

actions.name: AddCommunicationToCase
actions.description: Grants permission to add a customer communication to an AWS Support case

actions.name: CreateCase
actions.description: Grants permission to creates a new AWS Support case

actions.name: DescribeAttachment
actions.description: Grants permission to describe attachment detail

actions.name: DescribeCaseAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to allow secondary services to read AWS Support case attributes.This is an internally managed function

actions.name: DescribeCases
actions.description: Grants permission to list AWS Support cases that matches the given inputs

actions.name: DescribeCommunication
actions.description: Grants permission to get a single communication and attachments for a single AWS Support case

actions.name: DescribeCommunications
actions.description: Grants permission to list the communications and attachments for one or more AWS Support cases

actions.name: DescribeCreateCaseOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to describes the available options for creating a support case

actions.name: DescribeIssueTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to return issue types for AWS Support cases

actions.name: DescribeServices
actions.description: Grants permission to list AWS services and categories that applies to each service

actions.name: DescribeSeverityLevels
actions.description: Grants permission to list severity levels that can be assigned to an AWS Support case

actions.name: DescribeSupportLevel
actions.description: Grants permission to return the support level for an AWS Account identifier

actions.name: DescribeSupportedLanguages
actions.description: Grants permission to describes the available support languages for a given category code, service code and issue type

actions.name: DescribeTrustedAdvisorCheckRefreshStatuses
actions.description: Grants permission to get the status of a Trusted Advisor refresh check based on a list of check identifiers

actions.name: DescribeTrustedAdvisorCheckResult
actions.description: Grants permission to get the results of the Trusted Advisor check that has the specified check identifier

actions.name: DescribeTrustedAdvisorCheckSummaries
actions.description: Grants permission to get the summaries of the results of the Trusted Advisor checks that have the specified check identifiers

actions.name: DescribeTrustedAdvisorChecks
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of all available Trusted Advisor checks, including name, identifier, category and description

actions.name: InitiateCallForCase
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate a call on AWS Support Center. This is an internally managed function

actions.name: InitiateChatForCase
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate a chat on AWS Support Center.This is an internally managed function

actions.name: PutCaseAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to allow secondary services to attach attributes to AWS Support cases. This is an internally managed function

actions.name: RateCaseCommunication
actions.description: Grants permission to rate an AWS Support case communication

actions.name: RefreshTrustedAdvisorCheck
actions.description: Grants permission to requests a refresh of the Trusted Advisor check that has the specified check identifier

actions.name: ResolveCase
actions.description: Grants permission to resolve an AWS Support case

actions.name: SearchForCases
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of AWS Support cases that matches the given inputs
